metadata.title: Indian HR Overseas | Supplying Skilled Workforce to Gulf Countries
metadata.description: Your trusted partner for sourcing skilled and unskilled Indian manpower for construction, hospitality, and more in the Gulf region.

footer.tagline: Your trusted partner for sourcing skilled and unskilled Indian manpower for the Gulf region.
footer.copyright: Indian HR Overseas. All Rights Reserved.

industries.title: Industries We Serve
industries.subtitle: We provide manpower solutions across a wide range of sectors in the Gulf.

workers.title: Categories of Workers
workers.subtitle: We source a diverse range of professionals to meet your specific operational needs.

examples.skilledExamples: Electrician, Plumber, Mason, Welder, Carpenter, Drivers, etc.

whyUs.title: Why Indian HR Overseas?
whyUs.subtitle: Experience efficiency, reliability, and peace of mind with our comprehensive services.

countries.title: Countries We Supply
countries.subtitle: We are experts in the recruitment process for all major Gulf countries.

quote.title: Request a Quote
quote.subtitle: Tell us your requirements, and we'll provide a competitive quote for your manpower needs.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: A complete, end-to-end recruitment solution designed to provide you with a capable and reliable workforce, hassle-free.

manpower-supply.title: Manpower Supply
manpower-supply.description: We are experts at sourcing, screening, and supplying a full spectrum of manpower, from high-level skilled technicians to general laborers. We ensure that every candidate not only meets the skill requirements but also aligns with your company culture.

trade-testing.title: Trade Testing & Skill Assessment
trade-testing.description: Our state-of-the-art trade testing facilities and certified assessors conduct rigorous evaluations to verify the practical skills and competency of every candidate. This guarantees that you receive a workforce that is ready to perform from day one.

visa-processing.title: Visa & Insurance Processing
visa-processing.description: Navigating complex visa and insurance regulations can be challenging. Our dedicated team handles all documentation, applications, and follow-ups with embassies and insurance providers to ensure a smooth and timely process.

travel-arrangements.title: Travel Arrangements
travel-arrangements.description: We manage all aspects of mobilization, including flight bookings, airport transfers, and pre-departure briefings. Our logistics team ensures that your new hires arrive at the destination safely and on schedule.

bulk-hiring.title: Bulk Hiring Support
bulk-hiring.description: For large-scale projects requiring hundreds of workers, we offer specialized bulk hiring solutions. We organize recruitment drives, manage mass interviews, and coordinate large-group mobilization efficiently.

drivers.title: Drivers
drivers.description: We provide experienced and licensed light & heavy duty drivers for personal, corporate, and transport needs.

electricians.title: Electricians
electricians.description: Sourcing certified electricians for construction, maintenance, and industrial projects across the Gulf region.

chefs.title: Chefs & Cooks
chefs.description: Supplying culinary professionals, from executive chefs to line cooks, for hotels, restaurants, and catering services.

barbers.title: Barbers
barbers.description: Recruiting skilled barbers and hairstylists for salons and grooming centers, proficient in modern and traditional techniques.

truck-drivers.title: Truck Drivers
truck-drivers.description: Specialized in finding reliable long-haul and short-haul truck drivers with excellent safety records for logistics companies.

hotel-staff.title: Hotel Staff
hotel-staff.description: Comprehensive recruitment for all hotel positions, including front desk, housekeeping, F&B, and management.

plumbers.title: Plumbers
plumbers.description: Providing qualified plumbers for residential, commercial, and industrial plumbing installation and maintenance jobs.
